articles.description: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ETH dominance falls to 14%, lowest level in 3 years. AI coins strong as Nvidia & chip optimism returns. SWIFT set to build infrastructure for RWA trading. Coinbase launches wrapped Bitcoin product. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. Casino tokens rise, RLB up 100% in 2 weeks. Ape Punk sells in ‘heist’ for 10ETH. XCOPY editions & 1/1s see high sales. Fantasy Top trading volume continues to grow. Trump family set to launch crypto project Monday.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 199 - SO ABOUT YESTERDAY

articles.description: Magic Eden's grip on the NFT market has been cemented by a multi-chain approach under co-founder and CEO Jack Lu. Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.
articles.title: Why CEO Jack Lu Is Pushing Magic Eden Beyond NFTs

articles.description: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won’t advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 198 - THE GREAT APE HEIST!

articles.description: Crypto falls slightly after Presidential debate. Exchanges see highest BTC outflow since May. Be wary of Yen move for BTC: Hayes. SOL active addresses hit ATH. At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn’t go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.
articles.title: Fomo Hour 197 - Debate Disaster

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$29m, ETH ETFs: -$5m. BTC rallies, ETF has first inflow in 9 trading days. BTC may have put in first higher low in 6 months. Saylor predicts $13m price for BTC. Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 196 - THE INFLOWS RETURN!

articles.description: BTC: 55.3k (+2%), ETH: 2320 (+1%), SOL: 130 (0%). Top Gainers: FTM, TAO, BTT, AAVE, TON, ATOM. Crypto mini-bounce continues, BTC reclaims $55k. BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU’s down 95%.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 195 - CAN WE GET A BOUNCE?

articles.description: Media company DASTAN, the parent company of Decrypt and Rug Radio, is embarking on the next stage of its evolution with the launch of MYRIAD, a prediction market and engagement ecosystem that aims to “transform the digital media landscape.”
articles.title: Presenting MYRIAD, a prediction market and digital media engagement ecosystem

articles.description: Crypto weak after continued ETF outflows. Durov breaks silence, TON bounces 3%. Telegram will start moderating private chats. Hayes & Brandt flip bearish on BTC. Coinbase shares hit 7 month lows. 90% of crypto firm applications rejected in UK. Japan’s 3 largest banks to trial stablecoins. Trump promises again to embrace crypto. INJ launches BlackRock BUIDL index. DWF to launch synthetic stablecoin. Vitalik to donate all L2 tokens to charity. Most VCs in crypto ‘will disappear’.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 194 - ARE NFTS BACK?

articles.description: Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, Alice Liu, breaks down the highs and lows of meme coin mania in 2024. We’ve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we’ve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.
articles.title: Crypto Researcher Explains Meme Coin Mania

articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 193 - NVIDIA DROPS-OFF

articles.description: OI continues to rise as BTC stabilises. BTC still best performing assets class this year. FTX to distribute $16bn to creditors starting in Q4. Qatar introduces regulatory framework for crypto. ETH L1s fees down 90%, L2 activity ATH. Base hits 14m monthly users, many may be Sybil. ETH is in death spiral: Krueger. SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won’t help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 192 - WTF IS ETHERVISTA

articles.description: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.
articles.title: Dogecoin Millionaire Explains How Neiro United Meme Coins

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$72m, ETH ETFs: -$2m. BTC weekly volatility returns to multi-year lows. BlackRock BTC ETF sees first outflow in months. ETH dominance hits 4-year low. Vitalik linked wallet sells $2m ETH. Bukele talks up BTC impact in Time interview. CBoE files for ETH & BTC ETF options. Elon & Tesla win DOGE manipulation lawsuit. Macron denies inviting Durov to France. Trump promises to make US the ‘crypto capital’. Trump advertises Liberty Financial DeFi project. DeFi mindshare continues to grow.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 191 - CRYPTO STABLE

articles.description: BTC: 59.7k (0%), ETH: 2545 (0%), SOL: 146 (-1%). Top Gainers: HNT, IMX, ICP, ADA, KCS. BTC ETFs: -$105m, ETH ETFs: +$6m. Bitcoin in tight liquidation range, ETH outperforms. ETH ETF sees first in flow in 10 days. Funding rates all turn negative. Mr 100 buys 500 BTC in dip. France formally charges Durov, can’t leave country. TON jumps 6% after Durov release. TON faces another outage related to DOGS. AI coins fall after Nvidia earnings. Crypto payments about to soar: Armstrong. Binance denies freezing Palestinian accounts. CryptoCom & Standard Chartered partner.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 190 - OPENSEA VS SEC

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$127m, ETH ETFs: -$3m. BTC hits $58k after ETF outflows, then bounces. BTC sees largest exchange outflow in a year. Divergence between BTC & stocks grows. TON stops producing blocks briefly, price bounces. TON outage linked to DOGS launch. Maker DAO rebrands as Sky. USDS upgrade from DAI will have freezing function. Robinhood readds SOL support. SEC charges 2 brothers with $60m crypto scam. Nasdaq pitches options on BTC ETFs. Full-time open source devs under 8k in crypto. Crypto owners more likely to be ‘psychopaths’.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 189 - TRUMP LAUNCHES MORE NFTS

articles.description: BlackRock ETF sees biggest inflow in 35 days. BTC ETFs have 12 straight days of inflows. ETH ETFs have 8 straight days of outflows. ETH/BTC ratio continues to hit new lows. Russia to start using crypto for trade this week. Stablecoin TVL hits ATH of $168bn. Durov faces several serious charges in France. Telegram also under investigation in India. TRX flips TON, enters top 10 crypto coins. Crypto is the currency of AI: Naval. 84k new crypto millionaires created this year. SEC lawsuit against Kraken to proceed to trial. Aave proposes integration with BlackRock BUIDL. Celsius has repaid $2.5bn in assets so far.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 188 - TON CONTINUES TO FALL

articles.description: AI tokens lead ahead of Nvidia earnings. Crypto funds saw $533m inflows last week. BTC ‘bull market’ back on in IFP index. BTC close to ‘parabolic zone’ soon. Many coins ‘flipping back to bullish’ indicators. Open Interest begins to creep back up again. Binance Labs to focus on AI investments. 51 L2s now built on OP stack alone. Some exchanges rejected for Hong Kong license. Vitalik questions DeFi yields in crypto. New malware steals crypto on MacOS. Avalanche Discord hacked after Polygon.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 187 - AI TOKENS LEADING

articles.description: Pastor Kelby created a meme coin on Pumpdotfun which has since registered a church and developed its own religious theories and philosophies. Twice a day Kelby heads a sermon on Twitter where he spreads lessons from books that have personally helped him achieve happiness.
articles.title: The Meme Coin That Became a REAL Religion!

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$65m, ETH ETFs: -$1m. Crypto stays range-bound ahead of Powell speech. Russia plans stablecoins of BRICS countries. El Salvador buys 162 BTC with daily buys. AVAX up 15% as Grayscale launches trust. Tron removes 12k BTC from USDD reserves. Trump promotes crypto DeFi project. Crypto half of corporate political donations. PayPal & Anchorage partner for bank crypto rewards. Bitcoin mining market worth $74bn: JP Morgan. Bitfarms buys Stronghold in ‘strategic defence’.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 186 - AVAX LEADS PUMP

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$40m, ETH ETFs: -$18m. BTC breaks channel, ripe for ‘short squeeze’. BTC OI rises $1.3bn post Fed minutes. Kamala ‘supports crypto policies’ says advisor. Vitalik ‘bull posts’ ETH. Story Protocol raises $80m for L1. WazirX halts open orders after problems with Rupee. Coinbase & Ripple lead political donations. Salame claims government reneged on plea deal. EigenLayer team claimed coins despite being in US.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As Bitcoin (BTC) inches closer to a breakout, investors are scrambling to identify the next big opportunities in the crypto space. One of the most intriguing plays is the emergence of Mpeppe (MPEPE), a gambling-focused cryptocurrency that is attracting attention from Stacks (STX) bulls looking for significant returns. The combination of Bitcoin (BTC)’s bullish momentum and Mpeppe (MPEPE)’s innovative platform has created a perfect storm for those seeking a 150x gain. Here’s why Stacks investors are flocking to Mpeppe (MPEPE) and why both cryptocurrencies could benefit from the rising tide in the market.
 
Bitcoin (BTC)’s Gradual Ascent Sparks Renewed Interest in Altcoins 
After a volatile few months, Bitcoin (BTC) has shown signs of stabilizing around the $60,000 mark, leading to renewed o…
articles.title: Bitcoin (BTC) Creeps Up and Stacks Bulls Pump Into Gambling Coin Mpeppe For 150x Gains

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency market continues to show signs of recovery, Ethereum (ETH) is once again in the spotlight. Following a modest 5% rise in Ethereum’s value, investors are looking for opportunities to capitalize on the bullish sentiment. One such opportunity is Mpeppe (MPEPE), a new player in the blockchain gambling space that has been gaining significant attention due to its unique offering and potential for massive returns. With Ethereum stabilizing and Mpeppe proving to be a solid contender, savvy investors are finding ways to maximize their gains.
 
Ethereum (ETH) Market Bounce: A Signal for Growth 
Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, has always been a reliable indicator of the broader health of the cryptocurrency market. Recently, Ethereum (ETH) sa…
articles.title: Ethereum’s Bounce Back Allows Investors To Capitalize With Mpeppe’s Gains-Proven Coin

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency market continues to wrestle with volatility, Ethereum (ETH) has struggled to regain its bullish momentum. While Bitcoin has been consistently climbing, Ethereum seems to lag behind, unable to break through significant price barriers. As a result, investors are increasingly exploring alternative opportunities, with many turning their attention to the Mpeppe (MPEPE) ICO, a new decentralized gambling coin that promises explosive returns.
 
Ethereum’s Ongoing Struggles in 2024 
Despite being the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap, Ethereum (ETH) has faced a challenging year. Although the price of Ethereum recently saw a modest 2.92% gain, bringing it to $2,420, the overall sentiment within the Ethereum community remains cautious. Investors have expressed concerns…
articles.title: Ethereum Struggles To Bring a Bullish Sentiment To The Community Investors Join Explosive Mpeppe ICO

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As cryptocurrency markets regain momentum, investors are seeking opportunities to multiply their recent gains. Sui (SUI), one of the standout performers in the past weeks, has witnessed a surge in price by over 16%, with some investors locking in remarkable profits. One particular group of Sui investors has caught attention by redirecting their SUI gains into Mpeppe (MPEPE), a new AI-driven gambling platform. The potential of Mpeppe, combined with the recent performance of Sui, suggests that the collaboration of these two cryptocurrencies could lead to further significant returns.
 
Sui’s (SUI) Strong Performance and Its Impact 
Sui (SUI) has become a hot topic in the crypto world, thanks to its innovative technology and growing ecosystem. As a Layer-1 blockchain, Sui (SUI) uses its Move p…
articles.title: Sui Investors Maximize Recent Profits By 150x With New Gambling Coin Mpeppe

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
With Bitcoin (BTC) once again nearing the critical $60,000 mark, analysts are predicting that several altcoins could see massive rallies in the wake of this price action. Among the top contenders for explosive growth are Stacks (STX) and Mpeppe (MPEPE), two projects that have shown significant potential in recent months. Experts believe that a 300% rally could be on the horizon for both Stacks (STX) and Mpeppe (MPEPE), driven by strong fundamentals and growing market interest. In this article, we’ll explore why these two projects are primed for such impressive gains.
 
Bitcoin (BTC)’s Impact on the Market 
Bitcoin (BTC) has long been the barometer for the entire cryptocurrency market, and its movements often dictate the performance of other digital assets. After a brief period of consolida…
articles.title: 300% Rally On The Way For Stacks and Mpeppe As Bitcoin (BTC) Eyes $60,000 Again

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Dogecoin maintains its position as one of the most beloved altcoins in the crypto market, and the decline over the last few months has not eroded the bullish expectations for the meme coin. Analysts have continued to point out that the DOGE price is forming multiple bullish patterns on its chart and believe that the price is destined to go higher. A new prediction from crypto analyst DaanCrypto has added to the bullish expectations as the analyst forecasts a price jump.
 
Levels To Watch For Dogecoin
 
For the better part of the year 2024, the Dogecoin price has been in a downtrend and has broken below multiple trend lines. Even the $0.1 was unable to properly withstand the mounting bearish pressure and eventually succumbed in September. However, the worst may be over for the meme coin as …
articles.title: Crypto Analyst Says Dogecoin Breaking This Level Will ‘Get The Party Started’

articles.description: The latest price moves in bitcoin (BTC) and crypto markets in context for Sept. 17, 2024. First Mover is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter that contextualizes the latest actions in the crypto markets.
articles.title: First Mover Americas: Bitcoin Reclaims $59K as Traders Anticipate 50-Bps Fed Rate Cut

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As Dogecoin (DOGE) faces a period of stagnant growth and bearish pressure, top analysts are urging DOGE investors to consider adding GoodEgg (GEGG) to their portfolios. GoodEgg (GEGG), a new Social-Fi memecoin, is poised to outperform Dogecoin (DOGE), thanks to its unique AI-powered dating platform and rapidly growing community. With weak momentum continuing to plague Dogecoin (DOGE), now might be the perfect time to diversify into this promising new memecoin.
 
Dogecoin (DOGE) Faces Key Support Test 
Dogecoin (DOGE), once known for its meteoric rise from $0.0074 to $0.74, is now struggling to hold onto key support levels. Dogecoin (DOGE) recently started a fresh decline from its $0.1085 resistance against the US Dollar, dropping below $0.1035 and showing signs of further weakness. Analyst…
articles.title: Analyst Urges DOGE Investors to Add GEGG: New Social-Fi Meme Coin Poised to Outshine Weak Momentum

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The memecoin market has long been dominated by Dogecoin (DOGE), the token that famously skyrocketed thanks to social media buzz and endorsements from figures like Elon Musk. However, the landscape is shifting. Recently, Dogecoin (DOGE) has seen its trading volume drop by 0.50%, a concerning sign for a coin that relies heavily on community engagement and attention.
 
While Dogecoin (DOGE) has maintained its status as a key player in the crypto world, newer competitors like GoodEgg (GEGG) are starting to capture the spotlight. This shift in investor sentiment is driven by GoodEgg (GEGG)’s unique combination of Social-Fi elements and gaming features, which offer real-world utility and financial incentives to users.
 
GoodEgg (GEGG) Presale Surges as Investors Look for the Next Big Thing 
Whil…
articles.title: DOGE Volume Drops 0.50% as GEGG Shakes Up Ecosystem—Investors Rush to Grab Presale at $0.00015

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
A Shiba Inu (SHIB) millionaire, known for amassing a fortune during SHIB’s meteoric rise, has recently made headlines again. This time, the trader is betting big on GoodEgg (GEGG), an AI-driven social scoring and dating platform that is quickly gaining traction in the crypto community. In a span of just 72 hours, over 2.4 billion GEGG tokens were sold during its presale at $0.00015 per token, signaling strong investor interest and confidence in the project.
 
The Shiba Inu (SHIB) millionaire’s decision to diversify into GoodEgg (GEGG)  comes at a time when SHIB’s price has remained relatively stagnant. With Shiba Inu (SHIB) trading at $0.000013, many investors are looking for new opportunities to replicate the massive gains that SHIB once delivered. GoodEgg (GEGG), with its focus on AI tec…
articles.title: SHIB vs. GEGG: SHIB Trader Millionaire Bets on GEGG to Create Millionaires in 2024, 2.4B Tokens Snapped Up in 72hrs at $0.00015 Presale

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
A prominent Shiba Inu (SHIB) whale has made waves in the crypto community by introducing GoodEgg (GEGG), a new AI-driven Social-Fi coin. Known for his early investment in Shiba Inu (SHIB), which netted him millions, this whale is now betting on GoodEgg (GEGG) as the next big player in the cryptocurrency market. This bold move has prompted a flurry of interest from other investors, especially those who have been watching Shiba Inu (SHIB) closely.
 
The whale’s endorsement of GoodEgg (GEGG) comes as no surprise, as the token’s presale is generating significant buzz. With 58% of tokens already sold and over $438,000 raised, GoodEgg (GEGG) is positioning itself for a potential 300x rally, much like the early days of Shiba Inu (SHIB).
 
The Appeal of AI Social Scoring 
What sets GoodEgg (GEGG) …
articles.title: SHIB Inu Whale Introduces AI Social Scoring Coin GOODEGG (GEGG)—Investors Rush to Presale for 300x Rally

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The world of cryptocurrency is never static, and the race to the top can shift quickly as new innovations emerge. Shiba Inu (SHIB), long considered one of the top memecoins, is once again under the spotlight. However, this time, it’s sharing that spotlight with a newcomer: GoodEgg (GEGG). A prominent market analyst recently added GEGG to their list of hot tokens to watch in 2024, alongside Shiba Inu (SHIB), citing its potential to revolutionize the memecoin space with its AI-powered virtual dating platform.
 
With Shiba Inu (SHIB) priced at $0.0000138 and still holding a large community of supporters, the token has maintained a solid position within the top 20 cryptocurrencies. However, GoodEgg (GEGG), currently in its presale at $0.00015, is attracting considerable attention from investor…
articles.title: Market Analyst Adds GEGG to Hot Tokens of 2024 with SHIB, Find Out Why This AI Virtual Dating Memecoin Is a Must-Have

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
In a recent social media post, Charles Hoskinson, the founder of the Cardano blockchain, has reignited discussions within the crypto community by asserting that an upcoming upgrade will enable Cardano to surpass Solana in transaction speed. 
 
His statement comes in response to a community poll debating budget allocations for two competing proposals, revealing his strategic vision for enhancing Cardano’s competitiveness.
 
ADA Faster Than SOL? 
 
The poll in question asked the wider community to choose between funding a Rust node request or implementing a new feature called Leios. Hoskinson pointed out that while the Rust node would provide no differentiation for users, the Leios upgrade promises to increase Cardano’s speed without compromising its decentralization. 
 
This bold statement …
articles.title: Cardano Vs Solana: Hoskinson Sees Speed Supremacy For ADA Following Key Upgrade

articles.title: Experience A Gaming Experience Built By Gamers For Gamers At Thunderpick

articles.author: Arnab Shome
articles.description:
Alex Mashinsky, the former CEO of Celsius, is seeking testimony from his former top executives in court as his criminal trial is set to start today (Tuesday). According to a memorandum filed on Friday by his lawyers, he has asked the court to allow six witnesses, including the crypto lender’s former Chief Financial Officer and Chief Revenue Officer.
“As the CEO of Celsius, Mr. Mashinsky relied on information provided to him by the experienced team of Celsius professionals around him,” the memorandum stated, highlighting that Mashinsky did not intend to harm anyone.
Another High-Profile Crypto Trial
Mashinsky was arrested in New York in July last year and charged with defrauding customers and misleading them about the company’s profitability. He is facing seven counts of criminal charges, r…
articles.title: Celsius’ Ex-CEO Seeks Testimony of Former Top Staff in Criminal Trial
